mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(pNum, pCateNum, pName, pPrice, pDiscountRate, pContent, delivType, pDate) VALUES(#{pNum}, #{pCateNum}, #{pName}, #{pPrice}, #{pDiscountRate}, #{pContent}, #{delivType}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO storeDetailOpt(storeDetailOptNum, storeSubOptNum, pNum, pDetailCnt, pDetailPrice) VALUES(storeDetailOpt_seq.NEXTVAL, #{storeSubOptNum}, #{pNum}, #{pDetailCnt}, #{pDetailPrice})
INSERT INTO productImage(pImgNum, pImgName, pNum) VALUES(productImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pImgName}, #{pNum})
